name: Lone miner (DoVai)
description:
You are a lone miner, lost inside a humongous cave system. 

Your goal is to exit the caves without losing your sanity. Therefore, you explore the procedurally generated caves, find some Easter eggs and collect gold to keep yourself sane while looking for the exit.

Before playing, I suggest you to read the How To play image!

The game was developed in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2021 using Monogame engine. All the assets were drawn in Aseprite and levels are generated procedurally.
